item.title: Johnson completes £35m Palace move from Spurs
item.description: Brennan Johnson is set to be included in Crystal Palace's squad to face Newcastle on Sunday after his club-record £35m move from Tottenham was finalis...

item.title: The debate about whether the NHS should use magic mushrooms to treat depression
item.description: Many clinical trials to test the use of psychedelic medicines for conditions such as depression have been underway since 2022 - with surprising result...

item.title: FTSE 100 hits 10,000 mark for first time
item.description: A rally on the first trading day of the new year has taken London's main share index through the milestone.

item.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
item.description: Families are appealing for information about children as young as 15 who are thought to have been at the bar.

item.title: Men remanded after pensioner killed in hit-and-run
item.description: Retired dental surgeon Tom Wallace was hit in Gillingham on Monday and carried on top of the car.
